Establishing uplink with The Spiders From Mars...
Downloading today's horoscope from Mexico City... [ERROR]
Verifying integrity of the airlock handle...
Calculating trajectory to nearest Taco Stand... [CALCULATING]
Distance to Taco Stand: 4.2 Light Years.

Checking and may God's love be with you...

milestones.name: KARMAN_LINE
milestones.intel: The Kármán line is the internationally recognized boundary of space.
milestones.mission_log: We have left the atmosphere. Dante is floating. He looks offended by the lack of floor.

milestones.name: ISS_ORBIT
milestones.intel: The International Space Station orbits Earth roughly every 90 minutes.
milestones.mission_log: waved at the ISS. Pretty sure they didn't see us. Dante barked at a solar panel.

milestones.name: EXOSPHERE_LIMIT
milestones.intel: The outermost layer of Earth's atmosphere, fading into the vacuum of space.
milestones.mission_log: Earth is just a big blue marble now. The radio is picking up static and classic rock stations from the 80s.

milestones.name: GEOSTATIONARY_BELT
milestones.intel: Where satellites match Earth's rotation to appear stationary from the ground.
milestones.mission_log: Navigating through a graveyard of dead TV satellites. Just passed a rerun of a telenovela.

milestones.name: LUNAR_TRANSIT
milestones.intel: The halfway point to the Moon. The gravity of Earth begins to surrender its hold.
milestones.mission_log: Halfway to the moon. Eating freeze-dried tacos. Dante managed to catch a floating tortill chip.

milestones.name: MOON_SURFACE
milestones.intel: The Moon is Earth's only natural satellite and the fifth largest moon in the Solar System.
milestones.mission_log: Orbiting the Moon. It's grey and quiet. I told Dante about the cheese myth; he is now demanding samples.

milestones.name: LAGRANGE_POINT_2
milestones.intel: A stable point where the JWST telescope resides, shielded from the Sun.
milestones.mission_log: Hanging out near the James Webb. Trying not to bump the mirrors. It's very dark out here.

milestones.name: NEAR_EARTH_ASTEROID
milestones.intel: Passage of asteroid 433 Eros, the first asteroid to be orbited by a probe.
milestones.mission_log: Passed a rock the size of Manhattan. Dante growled low in his throat. Good instincts.

milestones.name: VENUS_CLOSE_APPROACH
milestones.intel: Venus is the hottest planet in the solar system due to its runaway greenhouse effect.
milestones.mission_log: Swing-by of Venus. Clouds of sulfuric acid. The hull temperature gauge is screaming.

milestones.name: MARS_ORBIT
milestones.intel: The Red Planet. Home to Olympus Mons, the largest volcano in the solar system.
milestones.mission_log: The Red Planet. Put on 'Life on Mars?' by Bowie. Dante is sleeping on the dashboard.

milestones.name: MARS_SURFACE_TOUCHDOWN
milestones.intel: Dust storms on Mars can cover the entire planet and last for months.
milestones.mission_log: Landed. It's dusty. Everything is dusty. I miss rain. I miss tacos al pastor.

milestones.name: ASTEROID_BELT_CERES
milestones.intel: Ceres is the largest object in the asteroid belt and is classified as a dwarf planet.
milestones.mission_log: Navigating the belt. It's not like the movies; the rocks are far apart. Still terrifying.

milestones.name: JUPITER_APPROACH
milestones.intel: Jupiter has a magnetic field 14 times stronger than Earth's.
milestones.mission_log: The radiation alarms are going nuts. Jupiter is beautiful and terrifying. A giant eye watching us.

milestones.name: EUROPA_FLYBY
milestones.intel: Europa has a subsurface ocean that contains twice as much water as Earth.
milestones.mission_log: Attempted to fish in the ice cracks. BASE_CDMX denied the request. 'No fishing for aliens'.

milestones.name: SATURN_RINGS
milestones.intel: Saturn's rings are made mostly of ice particles ranging from dust to mountains.
milestones.mission_log: Surfing the rings. The light refractions are incredible. Dante is mesmerized by the sparkles.

milestones.name: TITAN_DIP
milestones.intel: Titan is the only moon with a dense atmosphere and liquid methane lakes.
milestones.mission_log: Dipped into the atmosphere. Smells like gasoline. Don't light a match.

milestones.name: URANUS_ORBIT
milestones.intel: Uranus rotates on its side, rolling around the sun like a ball.
milestones.mission_log: Yes, I made the joke. Dante didn't laugh. It's very cold here.

milestones.name: NEPTUNE_WIND_TUNNEL
milestones.intel: Neptune has the strongest winds in the solar system, reaching 2,100 km/h.
milestones.mission_log: Turbulence is insane. The ship is creaking like an old wooden boat. Holding onto Dante.

milestones.name: PLUTO_OUTPOST
milestones.intel: Pluto takes 248 Earth years to complete one orbit around the Sun.
milestones.mission_log: It's barely a planet, but it's got heart. Left a dog treat on the surface for posterity.

milestones.name: HELIOPAUSE
milestones.intel: The boundary where the Sun's solar wind is stopped by the interstellar medium.
milestones.mission_log: The sun is just a bright star now. We are leaving the neighborhood. Entering true deep space.

milestones.name: VOYAGER_1_MARKER
milestones.intel: Voyager 1 is the farthest human-made object from Earth.
milestones.mission_log: Found the old probe. It's lonely out here. Played the Golden Record for Dante.

milestones.name: OORT_CLOUD_INNER
milestones.intel: A theoretical cloud of predominantly icy planetesimals proposed to surround the Sun.
milestones.mission_log: Nothing but ice and ghosts out here. The silence is heavy.

milestones.name: INTERSTELLAR_VOID_1
milestones.intel: The space between stars contains very thin gas and dust.
milestones.mission_log: The comms delay to BASE_CDMX is weeks long. We are on our own. Just me and the dog.

milestones.name: INTERSTELLAR_VOID_2
milestones.intel: Temperatures here are near absolute zero.
milestones.mission_log: Hull integrity 85%. Patched a micro-meteorite hole with duct tape and hope.

milestones.name: INTERSTELLAR_VOID_3
milestones.intel: Light takes over a year to travel this distance.
milestones.mission_log: Saw something moving outside. Sensors say nothing. Space madness? Or just a smudge?

milestones.name: INTERSTELLAR_VOID_4
milestones.intel: Halfway to the nearest star system.
milestones.mission_log: Running low on coffee. This is a level 5 emergency. Dante is sharing his warmth.

milestones.name: PROXIMA_CENTAURI_APPROACH
milestones.intel: A red dwarf star, the nearest known star to the Sun.
milestones.mission_log: Red light flooding the cabin. It looks angry. Or maybe it's just welcoming us.

milestones.name: ALPHA_CENTAURI_AB
milestones.intel: A binary star system. The brightest component is Rigil Kentaurus.
milestones.mission_log: Twin suns. Two shadows on the floor. Dante is barking at both of them.

milestones.name: EXOPLANET_PROXIMA_B
milestones.intel: An exoplanet in the habitable zone of Proxima Centauri.
milestones.mission_log: Potential landing site. Sensors detect liquid water. And... is that a tree?

milestones.name: THE_GREAT_UNKNOWN
milestones.intel: Beyond the known maps.
milestones.mission_log: We are keeping going. To infinity, and all that rubbish. Good boy, Dante.

idle_logs: SYSTEM: CO2 scrubbers operating at 94%. Replace filter soon.
DANTE: Currently chasing his tail in Zero-G. The tail is winning.
BASE_CDMX: Transmission received: 'Don't forget to wear a sweater, space is cold.' - Mom.
MUSIC: Now playing: 'Starman' - David Bowie.
SURVIVAL: Water recycling unit making a suspicious gurgling noise.
ANOMALY: Sensor ghost detected on the port bow. Probably just dust.
SYSTEM: Solar array efficiency drops 2% due to dust accumulation.
DANTE: Sleeping on the command console warm exhaust vents.
BASE_CDMX: Tech support suggests turning the ship off and on again.
MUSIC: Now playing: 'Rocket Man' - Elton John.
SURVIVAL: Ration inventory: 400 packets of freeze-dried chili left.
ANOMALY: Heard a knock on the airlock door. There is no one out there.
SYSTEM: Hull integrity stable. Duct tape holding on valve 4B.
DANTE: Barking at a nebulous cloud that looks like a cat.
BASE_CDMX: Uploading new mission parameters... [CORRUPTED]
MUSIC: Now playing: 'Space Oddity' - David Bowie.
SURVIVAL: Hydroponic potatoes are blooming. They look sad.
SYSTEM: Gravity plating fluctuation. Momentary floating occurred.
DANTE: Catching floating droplets of water mid-air.
BASE_CDMX: Asking if you can pick up milk on the way back.
MUSIC: Now playing: 'Eclipse' - Pink Floyd.
SURVIVAL: Found a chocolate bar in the emergency kit. Morale +100.
ANOMALY: The stars look wrong today. Too symmetrical.
SYSTEM: Engine core temperature nominal. Hum is soothing.
DANTE: Whining at the screen saver.
BASE_CDMX: Weather in CDMX: 24°C, traffic on Periférico stopped.
MUSIC: Now playing: 'Don't Stop Me Now' - Queen.
SURVIVAL: O2 partial pressure holding steady.
SYSTEM: Compiling error log... Error log is too large to compile.
DANTE: Sneezed. The recoil propelled him into the bulkhead.
BASE_CDMX: Sending virtual hug. Download complete.
MUSIC: Now playing: 'Across the Universe' - The Beatles.
SURVIVAL: Cleaning the coffee filter with a toothbrush.
ANOMALY: Radio picked up a talk show from Earth... from 1994.
SYSTEM: Navigational gyro recalibrating.
DANTE: Dreaming. Paws twitching. Chasing space rabbits.
BASE_CDMX: Alert: Lucha Libre results uploaded.
MUSIC: Now playing: 'Heroes' - David Bowie.
SURVIVAL: Air tastes stale. adjusting mix.
SYSTEM: Proximity alert... False alarm. Just a loose screw.
DANTE: Licking the viewport glass. Leaving smudges.
BASE_CDMX: Reminder: Renewal for ship registration is due.
MUSIC: Now playing: 'Comfortably Numb' - Pink Floyd.
SURVIVAL: Sewing a patch on the EVA suit.
ANOMALY: Saw a flash of blue light. Cerenkov radiation?
SYSTEM: Main bus B undervolt. Re-routing power.
DANTE: Bringing me a toy. It's a bolt he found.
BASE_CDMX: Mission Control is on lunch break. Tacos.
MUSIC: Now playing: 'Bohemian Rhapsody' - Queen.
SURVIVAL: Checking the algae tanks. They are green and slimy.
SYSTEM: Updating star charts. Please wait...
DANTE: Sitting like a human in the co-pilot seat.
BASE_CDMX: Asking for a selfie with the rings of Saturn.
MUSIC: Now playing: 'Life on Mars?' - David Bowie.
SURVIVAL: Thinking about pizza. Specifically pepperoni.
ANOMALY: External camera 3 is just showing static.
SYSTEM: Waste management system cycling.
DANTE: Hiding under the desk. Solar flare incoming?
BASE_CDMX: Packet loss 40%. Signal fading.
MUSIC: Now playing: 'Spirit in the Sky' - Norman Greenbaum.
SURVIVAL: Using a wrench as a hammer. It works.
SYSTEM: Thermal regulation active. It's getting cold.
DANTE: Demanding belly rubs. Mission priority updated.
BASE_CDMX: Sending coordinates for a supply drop (Theoretical).
MUSIC: Now playing: 'Mr. Blue Sky' - ELO.
SURVIVAL: Invented a new game called 'Wall Ball'. I lost.
ANOMALY: Radar picked up a whale. That is impossible.
SYSTEM: Defragging hard drives. 2 hours remaining.
DANTE: Growling at the vacuum cleaner robot.
BASE_CDMX: Happy Birthday from the ground crew.
MUSIC: Now playing: 'Ziggy Stardust' - David Bowie.
SURVIVAL: Repurposing foil wrappers into a hat.
SYSTEM: Analyzing external dust composition.
DANTE: Sleeping belly up. Zero gravity dignity.
BASE_CDMX: Interdepartmental memo: Stop sending meme transmissions.
MUSIC: Now playing: 'Here Comes the Sun' - The Beatles.
SURVIVAL: Calculating remaining toilet paper. Math is grim.
ANOMALY: The silence is very loud right now.
SYSTEM: Backup power engaged for testing.
DANTE: Trying to eat the light from the laser pointer.
BASE_CDMX: Transmission: 'Did you lock the front door?'
MUSIC: Now playing: 'Fly Me to the Moon' - Frank Sinatra.
SURVIVAL: Watching the Earth get smaller.
SYSTEM: Diagnostic complete. 3 minor errors found. Ignoring.
DANTE: Ears perked up. He hears something I don't.
BASE_CDMX: Sending updated trajectory. Don't hit the asteroid.
MUSIC: Now playing: 'Under Pressure' - Queen & Bowie.
SURVIVAL: My beard is getting out of control.
ANOMALY: A single snowflake hit the window. In a vacuum.
SYSTEM: Rebooting communications array.
DANTE: Has claimed the Captain's chair.
BASE_CDMX: Current mood: Anxious waiting.
MUSIC: Now playing: 'Shine On You Crazy Diamond' - Pink Floyd.
SURVIVAL: Reading the emergency manual for fun.
SYSTEM: All systems green. For now.
DANTE: Good boy protocol active. 12/10 rating.
BASE_CDMX: Connection stabilizing.
MUSIC: Now playing: 'Major Tom (Coming Home)' - Peter Schilling.

System green.

Mexico City green.
SIMPSONS_LATAM: BASE_CDMX: '¿Qué te pasó, viejo? Antes eras chévere.'
SIMPSONS_LATAM: SYSTEM: Security Breach. '¡Corran, corran por sus vidas!'
SIMPSONS_LATAM: SURVIVAL: Finding a crumb. '¡Maldito seas, ser asqueroso!'
SIMPSONS_LATAM: DANTE: Staring at me. 'Míralo, míralo... ahí está... con sus ojotes.'
SIMPSONS_LATAM: ANOMALY: 'Parece que el niño genio se equivocó.'
SIMPSONS_LATAM: SYSTEM: Error fixing protocol. 'Golpe de remo.'
SIMPSONS_LATAM: MUSIC: 'En el jardín del Edén...'
SIMPSONS_LATAM: BASE_CDMX: '¡Que no toquen nada! ¿Qué parte de no toquen nada no entendieron?'
SIMPSONS_LATAM: DANTE: Eating a wire. 'Sabe a... peligro.'
SIMPSONS_LATAM: SURVIVAL: 'Me quiero volver chango.'
SIMPSONS_LATAM: ANOMALY: 'Estoy viendo doble... ¡cuatro Krustys!'
SIMPSONS_LATAM: SYSTEM: 'Lo arruinaste todo. Gracias, adiós.'
SIMPSONS_LATAM: BASE_CDMX: '¡Qué elegancia la de Francia!'
SIMPSONS_LATAM: SURVIVAL: 'No conquistas nada con una ensalada.'
SIMPSONS_LATAM: DANTE: '¡Suéltame, quiero mi sándwich!'
SIMPSONS_LATAM: SYSTEM: 'Lisa, en esta casa respetamos las leyes de la termodinámica.'
SIMPSONS_LATAM: ANOMALY: 'Es como si no llevara nada... puesta... nada puesta.'
SIMPSONS_LATAM: BASE_CDMX: '¡Al diablo con todo, me voy a mi casa!'
SIMPSONS_LATAM: MUSIC: 'Marge, está puesta la radio? - No. - Ah, entonces soy yo.'
SIMPSONS_LATAM: SURVIVAL: 'Todo terminó señores, no tenemos escapatoria.'
CULTURE_MX: BASE_CDMX: 'Salió el Pan.' (Notification received at 6 PM).
CULTURE_MX: SURVIVAL: Craving a guajolota (tamale sandwich).
CULTURE_MX: SYSTEM: Alarma sísmica test. (Panic levels rising).
CULTURE_MX: DANTE: Chasing a 'mosca' that snuck aboard.
CULTURE_MX: BASE_CDMX: 'Ahí viene el del gas.' (Music plays via radio).
CULTURE_MX: ANOMALY: Sensor reads: 'Ahorita'. Translation: Never.
CULTURE_MX: SURVIVAL: Used a tortilla as a plate. Edible efficiency.
CULTURE_MX: MUSIC: 'La Bikina' is playing softly.
CULTURE_MX: SYSTEM: Cleaning bot is stuck. 'Ya se estancó el roomba.'
CULTURE_MX: DANTE: Barking at the 'Se compran colchones' recording.
CULTURE_MX: BASE_CDMX: 'Pásame la chancla.' (Threat level: MID).
CULTURE_MX: SURVIVAL: Making 'agua de calcetín' (weak coffee).
CULTURE_MX: ANOMALY: Space debris looks like a piñata.
CULTURE_MX: SYSTEM: '¿Bueno? ¿Bueno?' Connection testing.
CULTURE_MX: DANTE: Sleeping in the 'Chilaquil' position.
CULTURE_MX: BASE_CDMX: 'Cámara, ya se la saben.' (Dante growls).
CULTURE_MX: SURVIVAL: Missing the smell of rain on asphalt.
CULTURE_MX: MUSIC: 'Cielito Lindo' (Ay, ay, ay, ay).
CULTURE_MX: SYSTEM: Voltage fluctuation. 'Se fue la luz.'
CULTURE_MX: BASE_CDMX: 'No empujen, hay lugar atrás.'
GAMING: SYSTEM: The cake is a lie.
GAMING: DANTE: Doing a barrel roll.
GAMING: SURVIVAL: It's dangerous to go alone. Take this dog.
GAMING: ANOMALY: Snake? Snake? SNAAAAAAAKE!
GAMING: BASE_CDMX: All your base are belong to us.
GAMING: SYSTEM: Hey! Listen! (Navi voice).
GAMING: DANTE: You died. (Respawning...).
GAMING: SURVIVAL: Punching trees to get wood? Not working.
GAMING: ANOMALY: Detecting a creeper. Aw man.
GAMING: MUSIC: Tetris theme loop. Stress +10.
GAMING: SYSTEM: War. War never changes.
GAMING: BASE_CDMX: Finish him!
GAMING: DANTE: Leeerooooy Jenkiiiiins!
GAMING: SURVIVAL: Need more minerals.
GAMING: ANOMALY: Slender Man static detected.
GAMING: SYSTEM: Would you kindly lower the landing gear?
GAMING: BASE_CDMX: Praise the Sun! \[T]/
GAMING: DANTE: Arrow to the knee.
GAMING: SURVIVAL: Running out of health potions (Coffee).
GAMING: SYSTEM: Ah sh*t, here we go again.

TECH_SUPPORT: SURVIVAL: Clicking 'Remind me tomorrow' for 3 years.

DANTE_LOGS: DANTE: Woke up. Stretched. Went back to sleep.
DANTE_LOGS: DANTE: Judging my coding skills.
DANTE_LOGS: DANTE: Attempting to dig a hole in the steel floor.
DANTE_LOGS: DANTE: Ears radar-locking onto a snack bag.
DANTE_LOGS: DANTE: Sneeze attack. 3 sneezes.
DANTE_LOGS: DANTE: Howling at the moon (we are past the moon).
DANTE_LOGS: DANTE: Sitting on my foot. Can't move.
DANTE_LOGS: DANTE: Licking the air. Tasting the cosmos.
DANTE_LOGS: DANTE: Being a very good boy. The best.
SURVIVAL_LOGS: SURVIVAL: Socks are missing. Again.
SURVIVAL_LOGS: SURVIVAL: Talking to the plants. They are listening.
SURVIVAL_LOGS: SURVIVAL: I need a haircut. I look like Einstein.
SURVIVAL_LOGS: SURVIVAL: Craving pizza. Deep dish.
SURVIVAL_LOGS: SURVIVAL: Played solitaire. Lost to myself.
SURVIVAL_LOGS: SURVIVAL: Staring contest with a star. I won.
SURVIVAL_LOGS: SURVIVAL: Vacuuming. In a vacuum.
SURVIVAL_LOGS: SURVIVAL: Making a list of things to do on Earth.
SURVIVAL_LOGS: SURVIVAL: Checking the expiration date on the milk.
SURVIVAL_LOGS: SURVIVAL: Singing in the shower (it's a wet wipe).

HARD_SCIFI: SYSTEM: Retro-rockets firing.

OFFICE_SPACE: SYSTEM: Looks like you've been missing a lot of work lately.
OFFICE_SPACE: BASE_CDMX: Did you get the memo about the TPS reports?

OFFICE_SPACE: DANTE: Taken my stapler.
OFFICE_SPACE: SURVIVAL: I believe you have my stapler.
OFFICE_SPACE: SYSTEM: PC Load Letter? What does that mean?!
RICK_MORTY: SYSTEM: Wubba Lubba Dub Dub!
RICK_MORTY: ANOMALY: Look at me! I'm Mr. Meeseeks!
RICK_MORTY: DANTE: Where are my testicles, Summer?
RICK_MORTY: SURVIVAL: Get shwifty.
RICK_MORTY: BASE_CDMX: To be fair, you need a high IQ...
RICK_MORTY: SYSTEM: Simulation crashing.
RICK_MORTY: ANOMALY: Pickle Rick spotted.
RICK_MORTY: SURVIVAL: Just a regular old plumbus.
RICK_MORTY: DANTE: Oh jeez, Rick.

BTTF: SYSTEM: 1.21 Gigawatts?!
BTTF: ANOMALY: Great Scott!
BTTF: DANTE: Heavy.
BTTF: SURVIVAL: Where we're going, we don't need roads.
BTTF: BASE_CDMX: Hello? McFly?
BTTF: SYSTEM: Flux capacitor fluxing.
BTTF: MUSIC: 'The Power of Love'.
BTTF: ANOMALY: 88 MPH reached.
BTTF: DANTE: You built a time machine... out of a DeLorean?

TERMINATOR: SYSTEM: Skynet online.
TERMINATOR: DANTE: Come with me if you want to live.
TERMINATOR: SURVIVAL: I need your clothes, your boots, and your motorcycle.
TERMINATOR: BASE_CDMX: Judgment Day is postponed.
TERMINATOR: SYSTEM: Terminated.
TERMINATOR: ANOMALY: Liquid metal detected.
TERMINATOR: DANTE: Hasta la vista, baby.
TERMINATOR: SURVIVAL: I'll be back.
TERMINATOR: MUSIC: 'Bad to the Bone'.
TERMINATOR: SYSTEM: Cyberdyne Systems check.
MISC_QUOTES: SURVIVAL: Winter is coming.
MISC_QUOTES: SYSTEM: You know nothing, Jon Snow.
MISC_QUOTES: DANTE: A Lannister always pays his debts.
MISC_QUOTES: BASE_CDMX: Dracarys.
MISC_QUOTES: ANOMALY: Hodor. Hodor.
MISC_QUOTES: SURVIVAL: Chaos is a ladder.
MISC_QUOTES: SYSTEM: Valar Morghulis.
MISC_QUOTES: DANTE: The night is dark and full of terrors.
MISC_QUOTES: SURVIVAL: Not today.
MISC_QUOTES: BASE_CDMX: Shame. Shame. Shame.
MISC_QUOTES: SYSTEM: I drink and I know things.
MISC_QUOTES: DANTE: Ghost? Is that you?
MISC_QUOTES: SURVIVAL: Hold the door.
MISC_QUOTES: ANOMALY: White Walkers on radar.
MISC_QUOTES: SYSTEM: The North remembers.
MISC_QUOTES: SURVIVAL: Happiness can be found even in the darkest of times.
MISC_QUOTES: SYSTEM: Mischief Managed.
MISC_QUOTES: DANTE: Expecto Patronum (It's a bone).
MISC_QUOTES: BASE_CDMX: You're a wizard.
MISC_QUOTES: ANOMALY: Dementors nearby.
MISC_QUOTES: SURVIVAL: I solemnly swear that I am up to no good.
MISC_QUOTES: SYSTEM: After all this time? Always.
MISC_QUOTES: DANTE: LeviOsa, not LeviosA.
MISC_QUOTES: BASE_CDMX: 10 points to Gryffindor.
MISC_QUOTES: SYSTEM: The Wand chooses the wizard.
MISC_QUOTES: SURVIVAL: Master has given Dobby a sock.
MISC_QUOTES: ANOMALY: Whomping Willow detected.
MISC_QUOTES: DANTE: Yer a wizard, Harry.
MISC_QUOTES: SYSTEM: Lumos Maxima.
MISC_QUOTES: BASE_CDMX: Avada Kedavra (just kidding).
MATRIX: SYSTEM: Follow the white rabbit.
MATRIX: DANTE: There is no spoon.
MATRIX: SURVIVAL: I know Kung Fu.
MATRIX: ANOMALY: Déjà vu. A glitch in the Matrix.
MATRIX: BASE_CDMX: Blue pill or red pill?
MATRIX: SYSTEM: Mr. Anderson...
MATRIX: DANTE: Dodge this.
MATRIX: SURVIVAL: Ignorance is bliss.
MATRIX: ANOMALY: Agents are coming.
MATRIX: SYSTEM: Free your mind.
LOTR: SURVIVAL: One does not simply walk into Mordor.
LOTR: DANTE: My precious.
LOTR: SYSTEM: You shall not pass!
LOTR: ANOMALY: Eye of Sauron detected.
LOTR: BASE_CDMX: Fly, you fools!
LOTR: SURVIVAL: Second breakfast?
LOTR: DANTE: Po-ta-toes.
LOTR: SYSTEM: And my axe!
LOTR: ANOMALY: They're taking the hobbits to Isengard.
LOTR: BASE_CDMX: A wizard is never late.
Ready to work, Commander.

holidays.01-01: Happy New Year. Another orbit completed.
holidays.01-06: Día de Reyes. Check your boots for gifts (or moon dust).
holidays.02-02: Día de la Candelaria. Someone owes tamales.
holidays.02-14: Valentine's Day. Love to Dante and the stars.
holidays.03-17: St. Patrick's Day. The universe is green today.
holidays.03-21: Benito Juárez Day. Respect to the classics.
holidays.04-01: April Fools. BASE_CDMX told me the ship exploded. Not funny.
holidays.05-01: Labor Day. Taking a break from survival.
holidays.05-05: Cinco de Mayo. Celebrated more in the US, but I'll take a drink.
holidays.05-10: Mother's Day (Mexico). Calling Mom. Signal delay is 20 minutes.
holidays.05-12: Mother's Day (USA). Calling Mom again just to be safe.
holidays.05-26: Memorial Day. Remembering those who didn't make it back.
holidays.07-04: Independence Day (USA). Setting off virtual fireworks on the HUD.
holidays.09-01: Labor Day (USA). Work hard, float hard.
holidays.10-13: Columbus Day / Día de la Raza. Exploring new worlds.
holidays.10-31: Halloween. Dressed Dante as a spider. He hates it.
holidays.11-01: Día de los Muertos (Inn). The altar is set up near the airlock.
holidays.11-02: Día de los Muertos. Remembering the ancestors.
holidays.12-12: Día de la Virgen de Guadalupe. Roses in the void.
holidays.12-24: Nochebuena. Waiting for Santa's sleigh on the radar.
holidays.12-25: Christmas. Gifts opened. Dante got a new bone.
holidays.12-31: New Year's Eve. Watching the universal clock tick down.
